Title: Function/Modifier/Variable naming could be improved for readability
Content:
Several variables, functions, and parameters have names that do not represent their purpose clearly. This is most severe in the UserNote contract. To improve readability, consider renaming them to reflect their purposes more clearly. Our suggestions for renaming are:


#### In AddressRecord:


* [`registry`](https://github.com/InstaDApp/contract-v2/blob/4863c0c4156af7ded9cdb38b66e5f5e527c4a6d0/contracts/UserWallet.sol#L20) to `registryAddress`,
* [`logicAuth`](https://github.com/InstaDApp/contract-v2/blob/4863c0c4156af7ded9cdb38b66e5f5e527c4a6d0/contracts/UserWallet.sol#L25) to `isLogicAuthorized`.


#### In UserAuth:


* [`LogSetOwner`](https://github.com/InstaDApp/contract-v2/blob/4863c0c4156af7ded9cdb38b66e5f5e527c4a6d0/contracts/UserWallet.sol#L39) to `OwnerChanged`,
* [`auth`](https://github.com/InstaDApp/contract-v2/blob/4863c0c4156af7ded9cdb38b66e5f5e527c4a6d0/contracts/UserWallet.sol#L45) to `onlyAuthorized`,
* [`setOwner`](https://github.com/InstaDApp/contract-v2/blob/4863c0c4156af7ded9cdb38b66e5f5e527c4a6d0/contracts/UserWallet.sol#L53) to `changeOwner`,
* [`isAuth`](https://github.com/InstaDApp/contract-v2/blob/4863c0c4156af7ded9cdb38b66e5f5e527c4a6d0/contracts/UserWallet.sol#L63) to `isAuthorized`.


#### In UserNote:


* [`foo`](https://github.com/InstaDApp/contract-v2/blob/4863c0c4156af7ded9cdb38b66e5f5e527c4a6d0/contracts/UserWallet.sol#L81) to `targetAddress`,
* [`bar`](https://github.com/InstaDApp/contract-v2/blob/4863c0c4156af7ded9cdb38b66e5f5e527c4a6d0/contracts/UserWallet.sol#L82) to `dataInput`,
* [`guy`](https://github.com/InstaDApp/contract-v2/blob/4863c0c4156af7ded9cdb38b66e5f5e527c4a6d0/contracts/UserWallet.sol#L80) to `caller`,
* [`wad`](https://github.com/InstaDApp/contract-v2/blob/4863c0c4156af7ded9cdb38b66e5f5e527c4a6d0/contracts/UserWallet.sol#L83) to `value`,
* [`fax`](https://github.com/InstaDApp/contract-v2/blob/4863c0c4156af7ded9cdb38b66e5f5e527c4a6d0/contracts/UserWallet.sol#L84) to `data`,
* [`note`](https://github.com/InstaDApp/contract-v2/blob/4863c0c4156af7ded9cdb38b66e5f5e527c4a6d0/contracts/UserWallet.sol#L87) to `receipt`.


#### In AddressRegistry:


* [`LogSetAddress`](https://github.com/InstaDApp/contract-v2/blob/4863c0c4156af7ded9cdb38b66e5f5e527c4a6d0/contracts/InstaRegistry.sol#L10) to `UpdatedRole`,
* [`registry`](https://github.com/InstaDApp/contract-v2/blob/4863c0c4156af7ded9cdb38b66e5f5e527c4a6d0/contracts/InstaRegistry.sol#L13) to `rolesRegistry`,
* [`getAddress()`](https://github.com/InstaDApp/contract-v2/blob/4863c0c4156af7ded9cdb38b66e5f5e527c4a6d0/contracts/InstaRegistry.sol#L30) to `getRoleAddress()`,
* [`setAddress()`](https://github.com/InstaDApp/contract-v2/blob/4863c0c4156af7ded9cdb38b66e5f5e527c4a6d0/contracts/InstaRegistry.sol#L37) to `setRoleAddress()`,
* [`isAdmin`](https://github.com/InstaDApp/contract-v2/blob/4863c0c4156af7ded9cdb38b66e5f5e527c4a6d0/contracts/InstaRegistry.sol#L18) to `hasPermission`,
* [`_name`](https://github.com/InstaDApp/contract-v2/blob/4863c0c4156af7ded9cdb38b66e5f5e527c4a6d0/contracts/InstaRegistry.sol#L30) to `_roleName`,
* [`_userAddress`](https://github.com/InstaDApp/contract-v2/blob/4863c0c4156af7ded9cdb38b66e5f5e527c4a6d0/contracts/InstaRegistry.sol#L37) to `_actorAddress`.


#### In LogicRegistry:


* [`logicProxiesStatic`](https://github.com/InstaDApp/contract-v2/blob/4863c0c4156af7ded9cdb38b66e5f5e527c4a6d0/contracts/InstaRegistry.sol#L54) to `staticLogicProxies`,
* [`logic`](https://github.com/InstaDApp/contract-v2/blob/4863c0c4156af7ded9cdb38b66e5f5e527c4a6d0/contracts/InstaRegistry.sol#L62) to `hasLogic`,
* [`logicStatic`](https://github.com/InstaDApp/contract-v2/blob/4863c0c4156af7ded9cdb38b66e5f5e527c4a6d0/contracts/InstaRegistry.sol#L72) to `hasStaticLogic`.


#### In WalletRegistry:


* [`Created`](https://github.com/InstaDApp/contract-v2/blob/4863c0c4156af7ded9cdb38b66e5f5e527c4a6d0/contracts/InstaRegistry.sol#L110) to `WalletCreated`,
* [`LogRecord`](https://github.com/InstaDApp/contract-v2/blob/4863c0c4156af7ded9cdb38b66e5f5e527c4a6d0/contracts/InstaRegistry.sol#L111) to `TransferedOwnership`,
* [`proxies`](https://github.com/InstaDApp/contract-v2/blob/4863c0c4156af7ded9cdb38b66e5f5e527c4a6d0/contracts/InstaRegistry.sol#L114) to `walletRegistry`,
* [`proxy`](https://github.com/InstaDApp/contract-v2/blob/4863c0c4156af7ded9cdb38b66e5f5e527c4a6d0/contracts/InstaRegistry.sol#L119) to `wallet`.
